body_html: @protoget thanks for the clarification about the 3 dims. My question was with regards to time_steps. Is it ok if that changes from batch to batch? I have it running and it's not throwing up an error, but I want to make sure the resulting semantics are correct (modulo padding issue--I understand that the padded time steps are treated as actual entries.)

body: @protoget thanks for the clarification about the 3 dims. My question was with regards to time_steps. Is it ok if that changes from batch to batch? I have it running and it's not throwing up an error, but I want to make sure the resulting semantics are correct (modulo padding issue--I understand that the padded time steps are treated as actual entries.)
